channel.title: I have a couple problems...would greatly appreciate any help
channel.description:
1. I get very little exp when I fight monsters, how can I raise the amount given per point of damage?
2. My drops I entered are not working, can anyone tell me what is wrong? [code]npcdrop = 1200 1 -1 -1 1079 1 1093 1 1113 1 1127 1 1201 1 1319 1[/code]
[i]Note: The tabs aren't showing in my code, after each item listed there is a 1.[/i]
3. When I attack some monsters they stretch all over the place, any way to correct this?
4. It seems armor bonuses don't do anything for defense, can this be corrected?
[i]Thank you very much for your help. :D[/i]

item.title: I have a couple problems...would greatly appreciate any help
item.dc:creator: @wicked_destiny wicked destiny
item.description:
@wicked_destiny wrote:

  1. no aint possible
  2. yes add defencde bonus in items.cfg

Read full topic

item.title: I have a couple problems...would greatly appreciate any help

item.description:
@04rsxs wrote:

  1. I get very little exp when I fight monsters, how can I raise the amount given per point of damage?

  2. My drops I entered are not working, can anyone tell me what is wrong?

npcdrop = 1200		1		-1	-1	1079	1	1093	1	1113	1	1127	1	1201	1	1319	1

Note: The tabs aren’t showing in my code, after each item listed there is a 1.

  1. When I attack some monsters they stretch all over the place, any way to correct this?

  2. It seems armor bonuses don’t do anything for defense, can this be corrected?

Thank you very much for your help.
